text: (ai rasool) tum se log chaand ke baare mein poochhate hain (ki kyo ghatata badhata hai) tum kah do ki usase logon ke (dunayaavee) amr aur haj ke avaqaat maaloom hote hai aur ye koee bhalee baat nahee hai ki gharo mein pichhavaade se phaand ke) aao balki nekee usakee hai jo parahezagaaree kare aur gharon mein aana ho to) unake daravaajon qee taraph se aao aur khuda se darate raho taaki tum muraad ko pahuncho
